goals.active: Clear the murellow infestation from the Solitude Vale hot springs.
goals.complete: For Knut's special challenge, I chose to help the popular merchant Hekka by clearing out a murellow infestation that's been ruining her business. They were savage, diseased beasts, but I bested them all, and Hekka gave me her token as proof of success. I can only advance to the semifinals if I bring in the token before my opponent arrives.
